summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the amended assessment and amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2796 for the improvement of West Sixty-third Street from Twenty-sixth Avenue Northwest to Twenty-eighth Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by resurfacing, constructing wooden curbs and gutters, concrete sidewalks, providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 33451, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
